dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1133 IH: Repeal Community Development Block Grants Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McClintock (for himself and Mr. Weber of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to abolish certain grants for community development, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Repeal Community Development Block Grants Act of 2025.

subsection.text: Section 101 and sections 103 through 122 of title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 5301 et seq.) are repealed.
The amendments made by this section shall take effect on October 1, 2025.
